mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GIFTCON(user_id, img_url, brand, barcode_number, expiration_period, registration_date, use_yn, share_party_name, device_id, registrant, product_name, img_local_url) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{img_url}, #{brand}, #{barcode_number}, #{expiration_period}, #{registration_date}, #{use_yn}, #{share_party_name}, #{device_id}, #{registrant}, #{product_name}, #{img_local_url})
mapper.select: SELECT seq, brand, expiration_period, product_name, img_url FROM GIFTCON WHERE use_yn = 1 AND user_id = #{user_id}
